page.title: 05Employment_Leeswood&district
page.content: Unemployment is rather high in this area especially for men as local jobs go mostly to women. About three quarters of the adults are working and just a few people are self-employed.Most people work outside the village which means they travel at least five miles to work, usually by car.Agriculture, building, manufacturing,education and services are the most common occupations and nearly everyone works full time. Half of the unemployed have never had any previous jobs and almost everyone say that they do not receive enough money.
